remarks: A lower bound for the norm of a continuous linear operator.  Theorem 3.5(ii) of [Beran] p. 99.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nmcopex.1 $e |- T e. LinOp $.
nmcopex.2 $e |- T e. ConOp $.
nmcoplbi $p |- ( A e. ~H -> ( normh ` ( T ` A ) ) <_ ( ( normop ` T ) x. ( normh ` A ) ) ) $.
